body: There’s already an English translation for this manga over on MD
I know what it says, but I'm not professional- or you may say, pro enough to translate this by myself. Unless you can bring me the blood of mortal.
Does anyone know a translator that can translate this masterpiece to English?
Im here because a fellow man from the universe kissmanga said this is a prototype of okusama before it serialized into a manga ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
